org.artoolkitx.arx.arxj.rendering.shader_impl

Class SimpleShaderProgram

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.artoolkitx.arx.arxj.rendering.ShaderProgram
      • org.artoolkitx.arx.arxj.rendering.shader_impl.SimpleShaderProgram

  • public class SimpleShaderProgram
extends ShaderProgram
    The shader program links together the vertex shader and the fragment shader and compiles them. It also is responsible for binding the attributes. Attributes can be used to pass in values to the shader during runtime.
    Finally it renders the given geometry.

      • render

        public void render(java.nio.FloatBuffer vertexBuffer,
                   java.nio.FloatBuffer colorBuffer,
                   java.nio.ByteBuffer indexBuffer)
        There are several render methods available from the base class. In this case we override the ShaderProgram.render(FloatBuffer, FloatBuffer, ByteBuffer) one. Although we never use the index ByteBuffer. We pass in the vertex and color information from the org.artoolkit.arx.arxj.rendering.shader_impl.Line object.
        Overrides:
        render in class ShaderProgram
        Parameters:
        vertexBuffer - Contains the position information as two vertexes. Start and end of the line to draw
        colorBuffer - Contains the color of the line
        indexBuffer - TODO
